General.Name: Zhuhai Port Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhuhai Port Co.,Ltd. engages in the port shipping and logistics business in China. It provides services, such as general cargo and intra-provincial ship transportation; port tally; cargo loading, unloading, and handling; general cargo storage; and domestic and international freight forwarding agency services. The company also produces and sells beverage; researches and develops kitchen utensils, sanitary ware, and daily miscellaneous products; sells glass fiber and related products; and manages properties. In addition, it offers tugboat and customs declaration services; invests, operates, and services clean energy sources, which include wind and photovoltaic power generation, gas pipeline, and natural gas projects; invests in chemical raw material and chemical product; and offers counseling services. The company was formerly known as Fuhua Group Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhuhai Port Co.,Ltd. in September 2010. Zhuhai Port Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Zhuhai, China.
General.Address: No. 278, Lovers South Road, Zhuhai, China, 519015
